attributes.action: let all uk shops sell japan sweets drinks chocolate toys and anyproducts from jp
attributes.additional_details: better future is selling japanese and even korean food and there products here where small and big japanese food and toy business create jobs in citys and towns making small or big shops which makes money and jobs for British people even uk and giving opportunitys for us to have best relationship with japan and experience there culture here and see future bright for uk where kids and adult be more happy and thank you for new better future where obesity in uk will be know more the future is now
attributes.background: selling japanese sweets drinks chocolate toys any there products from japan here in uk will be best for uk and japanese relationship creating and making business opportunity from there small and big food & toy companys will make uk small towns and citys even you money and jobs for BritishPeople inuk

rejection.details:
It is up to individual retailers to choose whether they stock products from Japan. 

It is not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If you think that there are specific regulations which are preventing UK retailers being able to stock some products for Japan, you could start a petition about that.
